mapper.select: SELECT SHOP_ID AS shopId ,SHOP_NAME AS shopName FROM m_shop WHERE SHOP_ID=#{shopId}

SELECT mg.GOOD_ID ,mg.GOOD_NAME ,mg.PRICE ,mo.COUNTRY_ID ,mc.COUNTRY_NAME ,mo.ORIGIN_ID ,ORIGIN_NAME FROM m_good AS mg INNER JOIN m_origin AS mo ON mg.ORIGIN_ID=mo.COUNTRY_ID INNER JOIN m_country AS mc ON mo.COUNTRY_ID=mc.COUNTRY_ID WHERE SHOP_ID=#{shopId}
